translation.en: ♪ I came from the city ♪
translation.zh: 我来自这座城市

translation.en: ♪ Yeah ♪ ♪ Got my name from the city ♪ ♪ Where ♪
translation.zh: 是的 我的名字源自这座城市

translation.en: ♪ The most dangerous city ♪
translation.zh: 最危险的城市

translation.en: ♪ Let's take a trip back ♪ ♪ Back into time ♪
translation.zh: 让我们来一场回顾之旅 回到过去

translation.en: ♪ 1977 ♪ ♪ It was maximum crime ♪
translation.zh: 1977年 那时犯罪率最高

translation.en: ♪ The president neglected us ♪ ♪ Him and six masterminds ♪
translation.zh: 总统对我们视而不见 他有六个谋士

translation.en: ♪ Six powerful men Put New York through some drastic times ♪
translation.zh: 这六个强权者 让纽约进入煎熬的时代

translation.en: ♪ The rich and selfish ones ♪ ♪ Feed off the welfare ones ♪
translation.zh: 自私的有钱人 靠剥削领救济的穷人赚钱

translation.en: ♪ And which borough suffered the worst? Mm ♪
translation.zh: 哪一个区苦难最深？

translation.en: ♪ Where I'm from ♪ ♪ The Bronx ♪
translation.zh: 我的家乡 布朗克斯

translation.en: ♪ We had to rumble With rivals on the rubble ♪ ♪ While buildings around us Would crumble, unh ♪
translation.zh: 我们跟对手在瓦砾上打斗 周围的大楼摇摇欲坠

translation.en: ♪ I dreamed right ♪ ♪ But it seemed like Nothing find me but trouble ♪
translation.zh: 我充满了梦想 可是 我遇到的只有麻烦

translation.en: ♪ I see the light ♪ ♪ It's right there At the end of the tunnel ♪
translation.zh: 我看到光明 它就在隧道的尽头

translation.en: ♪ Had to find my rope ♪ ♪ To pull me up ♪
translation.zh: 我必须找到向上攀爬的绳索

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I needed some kind of hope ♪ ♪ To fill me up ♪
translation.zh: 因为我需要希望填充我的内心

translation.en: ♪ Till I met one guy ♪ ♪ Took me under the wing ♪
translation.zh: 后来我遇到一个人 把我拉入他的麾下

translation.en: ♪ I could have died if this man Ain't intervene ♪
translation.zh: 如果不是因为他 我可能早就死去

translation.en: ♪ He was an orphan My savior ♪
translation.zh: 他是个孤儿 是我的救星

translation.en: ♪ Free-spirited ♪ ♪ No man braver ♪
translation.zh: 他性情自由 没人比他更勇敢

translation.en: ♪ He was honored and gifted ♪
translation.zh: 他诚恳又有天赋

translation.en: ♪ His name was Shaolin Fantastic ♪
translation.zh: 他的名字叫神奇少林

translation.en: ♪ The lady-killing romantic ♪
translation.zh: 万人迷浪漫公子

translation.en: ♪ Can't forget the day we met And this story recants it ♪
translation.zh: 我忘不掉我们相遇那天 这个故事无法磨灭

translation.en: -♪ But yo, my life began last year ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪ ♪ Southmore High School ♪
translation.zh: 但我的生命是从去年开始 在索斯摩高中

translation.en: ♪ That summer I saw her Said to myself ♪ ♪ She'll be my wife soon ♪
translation.zh: 那个夏天我见到她 我对自己说 她很快会成为我妻子

translation.en: [older Ezekiel] Mylene, Mylene
translation.zh: （纽约 1977年） 迈琳 迈琳 我的奶油糖女王

translation.en: -[Mylene] ♪ Grown up in a broken city ♪ -My butterscotch queen
translation.zh: 迈琳 迈琳 我的奶油糖女王 （布朗克斯 1977年）

translation.en: -Mylene, Mylene -♪ I've seen shame but I don't want pity ♪
translation.zh: 迈琳

translation.en: -Mylene, Mylene, Mylene -♪ Maybe I'm too young... ♪
translation.zh: （布朗克斯 1977年）

translation.en: [young Ezekiel] Mylene, Mylene My butterscotch queen
translation.zh: 迈琳 迈琳 我的奶油糖女王

translation.en: This summer
translation.zh: 今年夏天

translation.en: Could you be my girl And I could be your king?
translation.zh: 能不能做我女友？让我当你的国王

translation.en: I beg your pardon
translation.zh: 我请求你原谅

translation.en: But I been loving you Since first day of kindergarten
translation.zh: 但我从读幼儿园第一天就爱上了你

translation.en: I blush when you see me I cry when you sing
translation.zh: 你看我时我会脸红 你唱歌会让我哭泣

translation.en: 'Cause when you sing, it's like...
translation.zh: 因为当你放声歌唱 就好像…

translation.en: -♪ The love you gave ♪ -It's like...
translation.zh: 就好像…

translation.en: -It's like how red velvet feel -[older Ezekiel echoes]
translation.zh: 就像红丝绒的手感

translation.en: That's how you sing
translation.zh: 你的歌声就是那样

translation.en: [Leon] I pray to God you ain't burning up my eggs, boy.
translation.zh: 祈祷上帝 你没把我的鸡蛋煎焦 小子

translation.en: You ain't got but one responsibility in this house.
translation.zh: 这是你在这个家唯一的任务

translation.en: -Not fucking up my breakfast. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -别毁掉我的早饭 -对不起

translation.en: "When you sing
translation.zh: “当你放声歌唱 就像红丝绒的手感”

translation.en: -It's like how red velvet feel" -Come on, man. Get off.
translation.zh: “当你放声歌唱 就像红丝绒的手感” 拜托 给我放下

translation.en: [Leon] "That's what it's like when you sing
translation.zh: “那就是你唱歌给人的感觉”

translation.en: Tender, like crying tears"
translation.zh: “柔软 就像哭泣的眼泪”

translation.en: [Wanda] Give me that. Leave him alone, Leon.
translation.zh: 给我 别烦他 利昂

translation.en: Morning, Queen Sheba.
translation.zh: 早上好 希巴女王

translation.en: [Wanda] Zeke.
translation.zh: 奇克

translation.en: -Keep your head out the clouds please? -Mm-hm. That's my point exactly.
translation.zh: -少做白日梦 行吗？ -我就是这个意思

translation.en: Which reminds me, later on, me and you gonna have a conversation
translation.zh: 这让我想起一件事 咱们过会儿好好谈谈

translation.en: about the damn toothpaste.
translation.zh: 牙膏的问题

translation.en: What conversation you need to have with my nephew about toothpaste?
translation.zh: 你要跟我侄子谈什么牙膏的问题？

translation.en: [Ezekiel] Mylene, when you sing
translation.zh: 迈琳 当你放声歌唱

translation.en: Boy go through toothpaste like he work at Colgate.
translation.zh: 这小子用牙膏太浪费 好像他在高露洁上班似的

translation.en: -[Ezekiel] When you render your splendor -[Leon] Tumbleweed on his head.
translation.zh: -当你展露风采… -他脑袋上像一团风滚草

translation.en: -Bathroom look like a pubic rain forest. -I surrender to the tender you engender
translation.zh: -洗手间简直像阴毛森林 -你的柔情似水令我屈服

translation.en: [Leon] His mama would not want his father figure going easy on him.
translation.zh: 他妈妈不会希望他的父亲 对他太心慈手软

translation.en: [Wanda] Father figure?
translation.zh: 父亲？

translation.en: -Rasping gasping love song -[Leon] Come on, now.
translation.zh: -带着喘息声的情歌 -拜托

translation.en: Don't get me started on the toilet tissue.
translation.zh: 我还没说厕纸的问题呢

translation.en: Boy must have the cleanest drawers in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 厕纸抽屉里一干二净 全布朗克斯第一

translation.en: -One of us gotta be clean. -Whoa, Shakespeare.
translation.zh: -总要有个干净的人 -等等 莎士比亚

translation.en: Enjoy your last day of school,
translation.zh: 好好享受最后一天上学时光 因为到了暑假

translation.en: 'cause come summertime, I'll make a working man out that ass.
translation.zh: 好好享受最后一天上学时光 因为到了暑假 我要让你好好干活

translation.en: Take a shower, Leon.
translation.zh: 洗澡吧你 利昂

translation.en: [Mylene] ♪ 'Cause I will not forget The love you gave ♪
translation.zh: 因为我不会忘掉你给的爱

translation.en: -♪ But be that as it may ♪ -[piano accompanying]
translation.zh: 但尽管如此

translation.en: ♪ Every night I pray ♪
translation.zh: 我每晚都祈祷

translation.en: ♪ For brighter stars More golden days ♪
translation.zh: 祈祷星光更明亮 日子更美好

translation.en: ♪ And to be taken far away ♪
translation.zh: 被带到远方去

translation.en: ♪ Be that as it may ♪
translation.zh: 尽管如此

translation.en: ♪ I know it's wrong for me to stay ♪
translation.zh: 我知道 我留下是不对的

translation.en: ♪ I cannot bear these shades of gray ♪
translation.zh: 我无法忍受这些灰色阴霾

translation.en: ♪ So now I'm on my way ♪
translation.zh: 所以现在我准备离开

translation.en: ♪ Be that as it may ♪
translation.zh: 尽管如此

translation.en: ♪ I will not ♪ ♪ Forget the love ♪
translation.zh: 我不会忘掉

translation.en: ♪ You gave ♪
translation.zh: 你给的爱

translation.en: So, I think that was the one, right?
translation.zh: 我觉得应该选这首 是不是？

translation.en: -Mylene. -What?
translation.zh: -迈琳 -怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, my God. [chuckles] That was--
translation.zh: 我的天 刚刚真是…

translation.en: -Did it sound professional? -That was superflicious.
translation.zh: -听起来蛮专业吧？ -“超特美”

translation.en: What's "superflicious"?
translation.zh: “超特美”是什么意思？

translation.en: -"Superflicious"? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -“超特美”？ -对啊

translation.en: "Superflicious" is super plus official plus delicious.
translation.zh: 意思是超级特别美味

translation.en: That's not a real word.
translation.zh: 这个词根本不存在

translation.en: It is if I say it is.
translation.zh: 我说出来就存在了

translation.en: So, after school we take this direct to Marrakesh Records, right?
translation.zh: 那放学我们就把这个 送去马拉喀什唱片 对吗？

translation.en: -It don't work like that. -How you know?
translation.zh: -不行的 -你怎么知道的？

translation.en: -They don't accept submissions. -[chuckling] I looked it up.
translation.zh: 因为他们不接受民间递送 我查过

translation.en: -[laughing] -[Angela] Caught red-handed.
translation.zh: 被我当场抓住了

translation.en: You know Daddy don't allow anything but church music in here.
translation.zh: 你知道爸爸不允许 在这里表演教堂乐以外的音乐

translation.en: Don't tell Papi, please.
translation.zh: 别告诉爸爸 拜托

translation.en: Only if you hand out the pamphlets.
translation.zh: 除非你去派发传单

translation.en: Coming.
translation.zh: 我来了

translation.en: ♪ Hand me down my hat... ♪
translation.zh: （阿黛尔时尚屋）

translation.en: -[Winston] Good morning, my sweet angel. -Good morning, Dad. [giggles]
translation.zh: -早上好 我的可爱天使 -早上好 爸爸

translation.en: Oh, come on, son. You missing spots over here.
translation.zh: 加油 儿子 这里你都没扫到

translation.en: We're gonna be late for school, Dad.
translation.zh: 我们上学要迟到了 爸爸

translation.en: No, Boo-Boo, you make yourselves late.
translation.zh: 不 布布 是你自己害自己迟到

translation.en: Wait to the last minute to do your morning chore.
translation.zh: 等到最后一分钟才干早上的活

translation.en: -[Dizzee] That's jive. -No, that's jive.
translation.zh: -你瞎说 -不 你才瞎说

translation.en: Come on. This ain't Little House on the Prairie.
translation.zh: 拜托 这里又不是《草原小屋》

translation.en: -Dizzee's got a point, Dad. -No, he don't.
translation.zh: -迪奇说得有道理 爸爸 -不 他没道理

translation.en: 'Cause that there is my little house.
translation.zh: 因为这里就是我的小屋

translation.en: And this here is my little salon.
translation.zh: 这里是我的小发廊

translation.en: And that patch of sidewalk, that's my little prairie.
translation.zh: 那一块人行道是我的小草原

translation.en: Less than a hundred years ago, the Bronx was all prairie.
translation.zh: 不到一百年前 布朗克斯整个都是草原

translation.en: Winston! What are you rattling on about?
translation.zh: 温斯顿 你在啰嗦什么？

translation.en: What's going on? You gonna make the boys late for school.
translation.zh: 这是搞什么？别害孩子们迟到了

translation.en: How am I supposed to teach them discipline if you undermine me?
translation.zh: 你老是贬低我的权威 我怎么教他们守纪律？

translation.en: I have to go to the writer's bench.
translation.zh: 我到作家长凳去

translation.en: -All right. -[Boo-Boo] Don't be late.
translation.zh: -好 -别迟到

translation.en: [Ezekiel] They're like, "Who you gonna give your demo to?"
translation.zh: 那你打算把小样交给谁？

translation.en: -I don't know. Different people. -Maybe I could help.
translation.zh: -不知道 不一样的人 -说不定我能帮忙

translation.en: Smoke this joint with me?
translation.zh: 跟我一起抽这卷大麻好吗？

translation.en: Mylene, I know you enough to know you got a plan.
translation.zh: 迈琳 我很了解你 我知道你有打算

translation.en: -Do you really think it was any good? -Yeah, Mylene.
translation.zh: -你真的觉得好听吗？ -是的 迈琳

translation.en: It's better than the original.
translation.zh: 比原唱还要好

translation.en: -Misty Holloway? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -比米斯蒂霍洛威好？ -对

translation.en: Come on. Be serious, Zeke.
translation.zh: 拜托 你认真一点 奇克

translation.en: You sounded as good as she does on that, uh, remix you always talking about.
translation.zh: 你唱得跟你提过的那个 她的混音版本一样好

translation.en: -Carlo Pakoussa? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -卡洛帕库萨？ -对

translation.en: [scoffs] I wish.
translation.zh: 我倒希望

translation.en: [Ra-Ra] Zeke's about to pop the big question to Mylene.
translation.zh: 奇克今晚准备跟迈琳表白

translation.en: And tonight we all gonna see Star Wars.
translation.zh: 今晚我们要一起去看《星球大战》

translation.en: Mylene ain't seeing no Star Wars.
translation.zh: 迈琳才不要去看《星球大战》

translation.en: And tell Zeke not to waste his breath 'cause my girl got big plans.
translation.zh: 告诉奇克别费力气了 因为我姐妹有远大的目标

translation.en: Her life's about to change. She gonna turn him down flat.
translation.zh: 她的生活会发生剧变 她当场就会拒绝他

translation.en: Mylene, can I tell you something?
translation.zh: 迈琳 跟你说件事好吗？

translation.en: When you sing, it's like...
translation.zh: 你的歌声就像红丝绒的手感

translation.en: how red velvet feel. That's how you sing.
translation.zh: 你的歌声就像红丝绒的手感 你的歌声就是那样

translation.en: Like how butterscotch taste.
translation.zh: 就像奶油糖果的味道

translation.en: Warmed up though, like how they serve it sometimes?
translation.zh: 但是 是温热的那种

translation.en: You sounded like that.
translation.zh: 你的歌声就是那样

translation.en: -[chuckles] -You're tender, like... like crying tears tender.
translation.zh: 你的歌声很柔软 就像哭泣的眼泪

translation.en: And at the end, right there at the finale...
translation.zh: 最后部分 结尾的地方

translation.en: Damn, holy shit. Your roar is a motherfucker, girl.
translation.zh: 真的 老天爷 你的声音简直迷死人

translation.en: Yeah, you talk good.
translation.zh: 好吧 你很会说话

translation.en: Ain't talk when it's true.
translation.zh: 我只说事实

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Oh, God. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 天啊 对不起

translation.en: -We don't do this no more. -["Shining Star" playing]
translation.zh: 我们不能再这样做了

translation.en: [Ezekiel] But we could.
translation.zh: 但我们明明可以

translation.en: -No. -But it's not like we do it all the time.
translation.zh: -不行 -但我们又不是整天这样

translation.en: Or ever, really. -Ay, bendito, don't be difficult. -But--
translation.zh: -根本一次都没有 -我的天 别这么难缠

translation.en: What are you doing tonight, for real? We can go see Star Wars together. Hey.
translation.zh: 你今晚干什么？ 我们一起去看《星球大战》吧

translation.en: I want you to be my girl.
translation.zh: 喂 我想让你当我女伴

translation.en: No. I got plans.
translation.zh: 不行 我有安排

translation.en: -What you talking about? -Okay. Can you keep a secret?
translation.zh: -你说什么啊？ -好吧 你能不能帮我保密？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: Okay, so tonight, Regina's getting me and the girls into Les Inferno.
translation.zh: 好吧 今晚雷吉娜要带我 跟另外几个女孩去地狱俱乐部

translation.en: Les Inferno? Are you crazy?
translation.zh: 地狱俱乐部？你疯了吗？

translation.en: -Gangsters be there and shit! -[softly] Shut up.
translation.zh: -那里有黑帮 -闭嘴

translation.en: I'm sleeping at Yolanda's 'cause it's easier to sneak out.
translation.zh: 我要去尤兰达家睡 这样比较容易溜出去

translation.en: DJ Malibu is spinning there tonight.
translation.zh: 唱片骑师马里布在那里打碟

translation.en: There's a dance competition. The winner gets to have dinner with Malibu.
translation.zh: 有一场跳舞比赛 获胜的人可以跟马里布一起吃饭

translation.en: That's what the tape's for. I'm gonna win the dance-off,
translation.zh: 带子就是这个用途 我要赢得跳舞比赛

translation.en: get him the tape so he can listen to it and say:
translation.zh: 把带子交给他 希望他听完之后说

translation.en: "Oh, shit, she's the next Donna Summer."
translation.zh: “我的天 她是下一个唐娜桑默”

translation.en: And then sign me to his label. That is so stupid.
translation.zh: -然后让我跟他的唱片公司签约 -你太傻了

translation.en: [Angela] Okay, I'll tell her.
translation.zh: 好 我告诉她

translation.en: -You're stupid. -[Angela] Mylene!
translation.zh: 你才傻

translation.en: Ven aqui! Daddy wants to see you.
translation.zh: 迈琳 过来 爸爸想见你

translation.en: I told him you were singing devil music and he said--
translation.zh: 我告诉他 你在唱恶魔音乐 他说…

translation.en: Thy voice shall only be lifted to the glory of God.
translation.zh: 你的歌声只能献给伟大的上帝

translation.en: But, Papi, Ezekiel and I were just preparing for Sunday's service.
translation.zh: 可是 爸爸 我和伊塞基尔 只是在为星期天的礼拜做准备

translation.en: -Okay? -Sorry, I--
translation.zh: -知道吗？ -抱歉 我…

translation.en: [Ramon] Should I ask Ezekiel which hymn you were singing?
translation.zh: 要不要我问问伊塞基尔 你们唱的是哪首赞美诗？ 因为你妹妹可不是这么说的

translation.en: That's not what your sister told me.
translation.zh: 因为你妹妹可不是这么说的

translation.en: -This is the last time you do this. -["Bad Girls" playing]
translation.zh: 这是你最后一次干这种事

translation.en: What you gonna do? Huh? Ah! Sucker.
translation.zh: 你能怎么办？ 笨蛋

translation.en: Your sister said that you made a tape singing that dirty Donna Summer's music?
translation.zh: 你妹妹说你录了盒磁带 唱下流的唐娜桑默的歌？

translation.en: Actually, Dad, it's Misty Holloway.
translation.zh: 爸爸 其实是米斯蒂霍洛威

translation.en: -[Ramon] So, it was disco? -[Regina] Mylene!
translation.zh: -所以真的是迪斯科？ -迈琳

translation.en: [Boo-Boo] Yo, Ra.
translation.zh: 喂 拉

translation.en: -[Ramon] You are in my church! -Bye, Mylene.
translation.zh: 你在我的教会里

translation.en: [Ramon] Straighten out or get out of my house.
translation.zh: -再见 迈琳 -你老实点 不然滚出我的家

translation.en: -Yo, Zeke! Still ain't getting none? -Mind your own.
translation.zh: -奇克 进展不怎么顺利啊？ -管好你自己的事

translation.en: I thought you was smart? It ain't never gonna happen!
translation.zh: 我还以为你够聪明 这根本是不可能的

translation.en: [Ramon] You are grounded again. You will not be sleeping at Yolanda's tonight.
translation.zh: 你又被禁足了 今晚不许你睡尤兰达家

translation.en: -Papi! -Looks ugly this time, man.
translation.zh: -爸爸 -这次情况非常糟糕

translation.en: Be home by 10, go to your room and study the word of God.
translation.zh: 晚上十点之前回家 直接回房间学习上帝的话语

translation.en: What? Mama, por favor, you promised me I could stay at Yolanda's tonight.
translation.zh: 什么？妈妈 拜托你管管 你答应让我今晚睡尤兰达家的

translation.en: Oh, please, don't provoke him. Your father's word is final.
translation.zh: 行了 别惹他 你父亲的话是最终决定

translation.en: -10 p.m. -You always take his side, man!
translation.zh: -晚上十点 -你每次都站他那一边

translation.en: [whispers] Go!
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: -Yo, what's got you down, girl? -[Mylene] God!
translation.zh: -有什么不顺心的？ -天啊

translation.en: -Yo, did you ask her? -Man, I tried.
translation.zh: -兄弟 你问她了吗？ -我试了试

translation.en: What? What you mean, you tried?
translation.zh: 什么？什么叫试了试？

translation.en: My dad's tripping, man. He's not gonna let me go out tonight.

translation.zh: 少林 我们的故事就从此开始

translation.en: I'll never forget...
translation.zh: 我永远忘不掉

translation.en: the first day we met.
translation.zh: 我们见面的第一天

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Shaolin] Hey. Motherfucker!
translation.zh: 喂 混蛋

translation.en: Motherfucker! Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 混蛋 站住…

translation.en: [boy 1] Hey, yo, we're gonna get you, man!
translation.zh: 喂 我们会抓到你的

translation.en: -[boy 2] That's right, you better run! -[overlapping shouts]
translation.zh: 没错 你最好快跑 -过来 -继续跑啊

translation.en: [firefighter shouts indistinctly] Hold it there.
translation.zh: 停住

translation.en: -Yo, is that the record? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是这张唱片吗？ -是的

translation.en: Yes! Yo, wait, wait, wait. So, how much you pay, man?
translation.zh: 太好了 等等…你花了多少钱？

translation.en: Uh... I got it for free.
translation.zh: 我免费拿到的

translation.en: -For free? -Yep.
translation.zh: -免费拿到的？ -对

translation.en: I almost got killed. Could've got killed. Might still get killed.
translation.zh: 我差点被打死 好险没死 现在仍然可能没命 赶快进屋 我是免费拿的

translation.en: Let's get off the street. I got it for free.
translation.zh: 现在仍然可能没命 赶快进屋 我是免费拿的

translation.en: All right. All right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 好的 好

translation.en: [Adele] Dinner!
translation.zh: 吃饭了

translation.en: So, all y'all kids going to the movies tonight?
translation.zh: 你们孩子们今晚都去看电影吗？

translation.en: Regina and I gonna go see that new horror flick.
translation.zh: 我和雷吉娜要去看那部新的恐怖片

translation.en: -[Adele] Which one? -Satan's Cheerleaders.
translation.zh: -哪一部？ -《撒旦的啦啦队》

translation.en: -I heard about that. -Satan's Cheer--?
translation.zh: -我听说了 -撒旦的…

translation.en: You boys going with them?
translation.zh: 你们男生也跟她们去吗？

translation.en: We're gonna see that new metagalactic one.
translation.zh: 我们要去看新的星系电影

translation.en: -Um, Wars on Mars. -Mars Wars.
translation.zh: -火星上的战争 -火星大战

translation.en: I hate science fiction. It's called Star Wars, fools.
translation.zh: -我讨厌科幻片 -是《星球大战》 一群白痴

translation.en: Star Wars. What about you, Mylene?
translation.zh: -《星球大战》 -迈琳 你呢？

translation.en: -I have to be home soon. -You sure you gotta go?
translation.zh: -我要赶快回家 -你一定要去吗？

translation.en: Yeah, my chariot turns to a pumpkin at 9:45.
translation.zh: 对 我的马车在9点45会变成南瓜

translation.en: -Oh, I see. -[playing jazz on saxophone]
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: Okay, Dad. Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 不错 爸爸 不错…

translation.en: -All right. Okay. -[Ezekiel] That was real nice.
translation.zh: -好了 好的 -真不错

translation.en: You wearing gloves now, son?
translation.zh: -现在你戴手套了 儿子？ -我说了爸爸 现在我喜欢流行艺术

translation.en: I told you, Dad, I'm into pop art now. I quit writing graffiti.
translation.zh: -现在你戴手套了 儿子？ -我说了爸爸 现在我喜欢流行艺术 我不玩涂鸦了

translation.en: Well, I just saw "Rumi 411" on the wall. It's like a copycat thing, Dad.
translation.zh: -我刚在墙上看见“鲁米411” -那是有人模仿 爸爸

translation.en: If you get locked up again, I'm gonna leave you in there, Dizz.
translation.zh: 好 如果你再被抓进去 我会把你丢在里面不管 迪奇

translation.en: You gonna end up getting married to a big old man named Mario.
translation.zh: 你会嫁给一个叫马里奥的老头子

translation.en: -[all chuckling] -Just watch your ass out there, son.
translation.zh: 当心点 儿子

translation.en: -You want a brownie, sugar? -No time for brownies, love.
translation.zh: -要不要吃块布朗尼 亲爱的？ -没空吃布朗尼了 宝贝

translation.en: -Late for the solstice jam. -What you gonna wear tonight?
translation.zh: -夏至活动我快迟到了 -你今晚穿什么？

translation.en: [whispering] Yo, not so loud.
translation.zh: 喂 别说这么大声

translation.en: [softly] I was thinking, you can't be dancing in this contest at Les Inferno by yourself.
translation.zh: 我在想 你不能一个人 到地狱俱乐部参加跳舞比赛

translation.en: -Maybe we could dance together. -[Winston speaking indistinctly]
translation.zh: 我们可以一起跳

translation.en: [Mylene] Together? You know they don't let kids in there.
translation.zh: 一起跳？奇克 你知道 他们不让小孩进去

translation.en: -...Planet Xenon! -[Ezekiel] But you're a kid.
translation.zh: -氙气 -但你也是小孩

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm female. And I'm fly.
translation.zh: 对 但我是女的 而且我好看

translation.en: I'm gonna project my aura to Planet Wakoobee.
translation.zh: 我要对瓦酷比星球释放我的气场

translation.en: You be careful on your surfboard.
translation.zh: 在外面玩冲浪板的时候小心 儿子

translation.en: Please don't go. I'm begging you. That place is evil.
translation.zh: 拜托你别去 该死 我求你了 那地方很邪恶

translation.en: Yo. No más, okay? I'm going. That's that.
translation.zh: 不 别说了 好吗？ 我一定要去 就这么定了

translation.en: [Winston kisses] Love you.
translation.zh: 爱你

translation.en: [softly] All right, Boo, count six. Rustoleum Federal Safety Purples.
translation.zh: 好了 布布 数到六 爱丽牌 联邦安全认证 紫色

translation.en: Now, what do you do if Shaolin Fantastic appears in the train yards?
translation.zh: 对了 如果神奇少林 出现在列车场 你怎么做？

translation.en: -[Boo-Boo] Run. -Good.
translation.zh: -逃跑 -很好

translation.en: 'Cause Shao'll pull your pants down and spray-paint your nut sack.
translation.zh: 因为少林会脱下你的裤子 往你的阴囊上喷漆

translation.en: Exactly, Boo.
translation.zh: 没错 布布

translation.en: -[Yolanda] This Misty track is the joint. -[disco music playing over speakers]
translation.zh: 这张米斯蒂的唱片简直一流

translation.en: Yo, Zeke ain't gonna get into Les Inferno by himself, you know?
translation.zh: 对了 奇克靠他自己 是进不了地狱俱乐部的 你知道吧？

translation.en: I just hope he doesn't keep asking me 'cause I can't, like, reject him again.
translation.zh: 我只希望他别再问我这事 因为我实在不忍心再拒绝他一次

translation.en: -[Regina] Mylene. -[Yolanda] Poor Zeke.
translation.zh: -迈琳 -可怜的奇克

translation.en: -I feel bad for your man. -Yolanda, Zeke is my friend.
translation.zh: -我为你的男人难过 -尤兰达 奇克是我的朋友

translation.en: -Not my man, okay? -That means I could go out with him?
translation.zh: -不是我的男人 好吗？ -是不是说我可以跟他交往？

translation.en: -[Mylene] I didn't say that. -'Cause you like him.
translation.zh: -我没这么说 -因为你喜欢他

translation.en: -Let's just figure out what I'm wearing. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -我们来考虑我穿什么吧 -好

translation.en: [Dizzee] Now, if you do have to run from Shaolin, remember,
translation.zh: 如果少林追你 你逃的时候 记住

translation.en: what rail do you watch out for?
translation.zh: 要小心哪种栏杆

translation.en: Duh. The third rail.
translation.zh: 还用说吗？第三根栏杆

translation.en: Yo, I heard he's called Shao 007 'cause he got a 7-inch weenie.
translation.zh: 对了 我听说他的少林007的名字 是因为他的小弟弟七英寸

translation.en: -That's pretty average, Boo. -Oh.
translation.zh: 这是很普通的长度

translation.en: [announcer on TV] Up next. Gangs for hire.
translation.zh: 下面的主题是黑道雇佣兵

translation.en: A special report. Our fearless... [continues indistinctly]
translation.zh: 特别报道 我们无所畏惧的…

translation.en: Very conservative.
translation.zh: 非常保守

translation.en: It's not like any hustlers, gangsters or pimps are gonna notice her.
translation.zh: 那里的小偷 混黑道的 拉皮条的都不会注意到她

translation.en: You think so?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: No, man. You gonna have to fly solo, man.
translation.zh: 不行 兄弟 你必须单飞

translation.en: -Solo? -To Les Inferno. You gotta go alone.
translation.zh: -单飞？ -你要一个人去地狱俱乐部

translation.en: But when you storm the gates, you need to dress to kill, man.
translation.zh: 但是进门的时候 你必须打扮得够有型

translation.en: You need to be off the chain, you need to be ready, okay?
translation.zh: 你要迷死人 要做好准备 知道吗？

translation.en: -Okay. I'm ready. -You ready?
translation.zh: -好 -你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -You ready? -I'm ready.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？ -我准备好了

translation.en: ...most violent gang is also...
translation.zh: 大多数暴力帮派还…

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了

translation.en: The Savage Warlords have begun dabbling in murder-for-hire.
translation.zh: 野蛮军阀开始介入收钱杀人这个行业

translation.en: A hit that left four dead last week is being blamed on...
translation.zh: 上周一场导致四人死亡的谋杀案 被归咎于…

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 不错 不错

translation.en: I don't know about this, brother. These are your father's fine vines.
translation.zh: 我觉得不该拿这件 这是你爸爸的高级衣服

translation.en: My father don't care about stuff like this.
translation.zh: 我爸爸才不在乎这些东西

translation.en: This is the one. I'm ready.
translation.zh: -就要这一件 -我准备好了

translation.en: Damn straight.
translation.zh: 那就对了

translation.en: You got the record. I got the record.
translation.zh: -带上唱片 -带上唱片

translation.en: -You're looking fly. -I'm looking fly.
translation.zh: -你太帅了 -我很帅

translation.en: Remember, you gotta be harder than hard up there.
translation.zh: 记住 到了那里 你要表情冷酷

translation.en: -Be ready to fight anyone for your woman. -She's mine.
translation.zh: -为了你的女人 愿意跟每个人打架 -她是我的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: They never gonna let you in with them rags on your feet.
translation.zh: 脚上这样一双破鞋 人家不会让你进门

translation.en: -[announcer on TV] Two bodies found... -Yeah, faster, baby. Yeah.
translation.zh: 两具尸体被发现… 对 再快点 亲爱的 对

translation.en: ...casualties of a turf war as Nicky Barnes of Harlem
translation.zh: 一场地盘之争致人死亡 因为哈林区的尼基巴恩斯

translation.en: and Fat Annie of the South Bronx fight for control of the heroin trade north...
translation.zh: 和布朗克斯南区的肥安妮 在争夺北区的海洛因贸易权

translation.en: "And then the Lord laid the sins of the father upon the child.
translation.zh: 然后上帝把父亲的罪放在孩子身上

translation.en: For though he is merciful, even the righteous are born in sin
translation.zh: 因为虽然他很慈悲 但最正义的人也生来有罪

translation.en: and must bear the iniquities of their fathers."
translation.zh: 必须承担他们父辈的不义

translation.en: [Mylene] Hey, girls.
translation.zh: 我的姐妹

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[both shriek]
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: See, I told you she coming.
translation.zh: 看 我就知道她会来

translation.en: That's right, girl. I've got mad respect for you... [gasps] ...and for that dress.
translation.zh: 太对了 姐妹 现在我好尊重你 还有那条裙子

translation.en: -Do you like it? -[Regina] Like it?
translation.zh: -你喜欢吗？ -还用说吗？

translation.en: -Girl, you look almost as good as me. -Oh, shut up.
translation.zh: -姐妹 你几乎跟我一样美了 -闭嘴

translation.en: Malibu is gonna sign you for sure. Girl, he better.
translation.zh: -马里布绝对会签下你的 -他最好签我

translation.en: -[Yolanda] Mm-hm. -[Regina] Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: -[girls whooping] -[Yolanda] Keep looking real good.
translation.zh: 继续保持美貌

translation.en: [Dizzee] Nice and quiet, Boo. These lamps, they belong to Shaolin Fantastic.
translation.zh: 安静一点 布布 这些地盘 它们属于神奇少林

translation.en: Oh, shit. Check this out.
translation.zh: 该死 看这个

translation.en: He's here, Dizz. Look.
translation.zh: 他来过这里 迪奇 你看

translation.en: [Dizzee] Don't worry. That's from last week. But if you see the red Pumas--
translation.zh: 别担心 那是上周的 但如果你看到那双红色的彪马

translation.en: [Boo-Boo] I know. Run.
translation.zh: 我知道 看到就跑

translation.en: -[disco music playing over speakers] -[chattering]
translation.zh: （地狱俱乐部）

translation.en: [Pito] Who wants to get in, huh? Who wants to get in?
translation.zh: 谁想进去？谁想进？

translation.en: Why you keep checking your watch, Wolf? You got someplace to go?
translation.zh: 干嘛不停地看表 沃夫？ 要赶去什么地方吗？

translation.en: Just waiting on your birthday cake, boss.
translation.zh: 在等你的生日蛋糕 老板

translation.en: Ordered you a real special one this year.
translation.zh: 今年给你订了个特制的

translation.en: Store-bought is fine by me.
translation.zh: 在店里买现成的就行

translation.en: Not like that Nicky Barnes.
translation.zh: 我不像那个尼基巴恩斯

translation.en: What kind of drug lord poses on the cover of Time magazine?
translation.zh: 什么样的大毒枭 敢出现在《时代》杂志封面上？

translation.en: Mr. Untouchable. Mm.
translation.zh: 自以为没人动得了他

translation.en: [Wolf] Since that cover, people calling Nicky "the king."
translation.zh: 因为那幅杂志封面 现在人们都叫尼基“大王”

translation.en: All hail the king. -Nicky-- -"King"?
translation.zh: -向大王欢呼 尼基大王 -大王？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: [Boo-Boo] Would Shaolin really come after us? What'd he want from us?
translation.zh: 少林真的会追我们吗？ 他需要我们干什么？

translation.en: I mean, I heard he's so rich he got 100 pairs of Pumas.
translation.zh: 我听说他很有钱 有上百双彪马鞋

translation.en: I don't know. Yo, Boo. Why you letting it drip like that?
translation.zh: 我也不知道 对了 布布 怎么能让它往下滴？我怎么教你的？

translation.en: What'd I teach you?
translation.zh: 怎么能让它往下滴？我怎么教你的？

translation.en: "Hold it upright."
translation.zh: -“拿直了” -直着拿罐子

translation.en: Hold the can upright. Move on. Move on. That's done.
translation.zh: -“拿直了” -直着拿罐子 往前 往前 -这样可以了 -我说真的

translation.en: [Boo-Boo] But seriously.
translation.zh: -这样可以了 -我说真的

translation.en: You think he got enough money for that many shoes?
translation.zh: 他真的那么有钱吗？买那么多鞋？

translation.en: Enjoy the music.
translation.zh: 希望音乐你喜欢

translation.en: Shit. Nicky Barnes ain't got nothing this birthday girl ain't got.
translation.zh: 该死 尼基巴恩斯有的 我这个寿星女也都有

translation.en: I got this here club, plus the disco downstairs,
translation.zh: 我有这家俱乐部 还有楼下的迪斯科 还有三间夜店

translation.en: plus three after-hours joints,
translation.zh: 还有楼下的迪斯科 还有三间夜店

translation.en: prostitution, gambling,
translation.zh: 卖淫 赌博 高利贷

translation.en: numbers, a day-care center.
translation.zh: 卖淫 赌博 高利贷 日托中心

translation.en: And I still got time to control half the cocaine in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 而且我还有时间 控制布朗克斯一半的可卡因交易

translation.en: All Nicky do is sling dope.
translation.zh: 尼基只会卖毒品

translation.en: And I'll tell you something else, Wolf.
translation.zh: 再告诉你一件事 沃夫 记住我的话

translation.en: Mark my words, this time next year,
translation.zh: 再告诉你一件事 沃夫 记住我的话 明年这个时候 我会干掉 那该死的尼基巴恩斯

translation.en: I'm gonna take motherfucking Nicky Barnes the fuck out
translation.zh: 明年这个时候 我会干掉 那该死的尼基巴恩斯

translation.en: and expand to Harlem. Sound good to you?
translation.zh: 扩张到哈林去 你觉得还可以吗？

translation.en: -Nephew? -You the boss.
translation.zh: -侄子？ -你是老大

translation.en: -[Slim] All hail the queen. -[man] Here, here.
translation.zh: -为女王欢呼 -干杯

translation.en: -That's right, motherfucker. -I got the music.
translation.zh: 这就对了 混蛋

translation.en: You wanna check your watch or you wanna play?
translation.zh: 你到底看表还是放开玩？

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: You got my favorite song.
translation.zh: 你这里有我最喜欢的歌

translation.en: The greatest hits.
translation.zh: 最红歌曲

translation.en: It's all there?
translation.zh: 到在这了？

translation.en: A quarter ounce in twenty-fives.
translation.zh: 四分之一盎司 25块一包

translation.en: You sound like you expect something different, boss.
translation.zh: 好像你有别的期待 老板

translation.en: I expect shit to be right.
translation.zh: 我期待算对账

translation.en: Move that shit.
translation.zh: 把东西拿开

translation.en: [Annie] Well, look who's here.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧谁来了

translation.en: Like Paul Revere.
translation.zh: 好像保罗列维尔

translation.en: Come kiss these dice for me, baby.
translation.zh: 为我吻一下这些骰子 宝贝

translation.en: Hey, come on now, you got a grip of my money right there.
translation.zh: 过来 看住我的钱

translation.en: And I'm about to get some more. You know I like 'em young, right?
translation.zh: 我会赚到更多钱 你知道我喜欢嫩的 对吧？

translation.en: -[laughs] -Yeah, I do. I remember.
translation.zh: 对 我知道 我记得

translation.en: -Shit. -Oh, damn.
translation.zh: -该死 -不是吧

translation.en: What'd I say? Hey.
translation.zh: 我说得没错吧？嘿

translation.en: Got you something sweet, Miss Annie.
translation.zh: 给你送好东西了 安妮小姐

translation.en: -Oh, you got more manners than my own son. -[Shaolin] Happy birthday, Annie.
translation.zh: -比我儿子还懂礼貌 -生日快乐 安妮

translation.en: Thank you, sugar. Now give me some sugar, baby.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 宝贝 给我个甜吻 宝贝

translation.en: -[Annie] Mm. Mm... -[Wolf] Hey. Hey.
translation.zh: 行了 行了

translation.en: -Mm. -[Wolf] Hey.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Mm. So young and so fine, like ripe blackberry wine.
translation.zh: 这么年轻 这么英俊 像熟透的黑莓酒

translation.en: That boy's gonna be a boss someday. He's gonna rock it like a Rockefeller.
translation.zh: 这男孩将来能当上老板 他会像洛克菲勒家的人一样牛

translation.en: What's my name? What's my name?
translation.zh: 我叫什么名字？我叫什么名字？

translation.en: 'Cause I think you forgot.
translation.zh: 我看你是忘了

translation.en: [Annie] First time I saw him out back parking cars for nickels, said to myself:
translation.zh: 第一次看见他 他靠给人停车 赚点零钱 我就在心里说

translation.en: "Mm-hm. I'm gonna groom him real good."
translation.zh: “我要好好培养他”

translation.en: -[Shaolin] Yo! -♪ Burn, baby, burn ♪
translation.zh: （地狱俱乐部）

translation.en: Whoo! Sailor.
translation.zh: 水手

translation.en: Take it easy. Huh?
translation.zh: 放轻松

translation.en: -[man] What took your slow ass so long? -[laughter]
translation.zh: 怎么现在才来？

translation.en: You know I can't dance without my lucky lollipops.
translation.zh: 你知道没有我的幸运棒棒糖 我就没法跳舞

translation.en: Yo, Shaolin Fan-faggot.
translation.zh: 喂 少林男同性恋

translation.en: Come here. Come here. Come here. Come here. Come here.
translation.zh: 过来…

translation.en: Sit down. Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下 坐

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: My cousin here tells me that you kissed my mama on her big juicy lips.
translation.zh: 我表弟告诉我 你吻了我妈妈多汁的厚嘴唇

translation.en: Did you do that?
translation.zh: 你真这样做了吗？
